document.full_text: a u.s. army private deemed mentally ill by psychiatrists was sentenced to 12 1/2 years in prison on wednesday after pleading guilty to murdering a taliban commander who was shackled inside a jail cell in afghanistan last october.
document.title: u.s. army private admits murdering taliban detainee
lines_and_colors: a u.s. army private deemed mentally ill by psychiatrists was sentenced to 12 1/2 years in prison on wednesday after pleading guilty to murdering a taliban commander who was shackled inside a jail cell in afghanistan last october.
